name: Francesco Zhabikuch
description:
Made for a game jam with a theme: "You have to gather your party before venturing forth." 

You are a frog – Francesco Zhabikuch – that is trying to save his fiance Bella Putana. A classic frog in distress story.

In order to save her, Francesco must gather party of adventurers IN HIS MOUTH and then spit them back to fight enemies. Your party is hidden IN YOUR MOUTH magazine style (aka last hero that went in will be first one spat out). Heroes fight in timed intervals where different colored enemies and heroes deal different damage to certain colors. But be vigilant because heroes can run away from you if aren't careful.

Warning: Game is partially in Italian – we think.
